name: Grilled Ham
ingredients: 1 can (8oz) crushed pineapple, drained 2 tsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. orange marmalade 2 tsp. minced jalapeno pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped cilantro or parsley salt to taste
steps: Fully cooked sliced ham (1/4 to 3/4 inch thick)
Heat grill. Grill 4 to 6 inches from medium heat for 6-­‐12 minutes or until thoroughly heated, turn in middle
of cooking time. Serve with Pineapple salsa if desired.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
